name: OptionsTest
description: Unit tests for the Options class in the Apache Commons CLI library, focusing on various functionalities like adding options, handling conflicts, and testing deprecated options.

test_cases.name: testAddConflictingOptions
test_cases.description: Tests the addition of conflicting options to an Options object, expecting an IllegalArgumentException.

test_cases.name: testAddNonConflictingOptions
test_cases.description: Tests the addition of non-conflicting options to an Options object, ensuring the correct options and groups are added.

test_cases.name: testAddOptions
test_cases.description: Tests the addition of options to an Options object, ensuring the correct options and groups are added.

test_cases.name: testAddOptions2X
test_cases.description: Tests the addition of options to an Options object, expecting an IllegalArgumentException due to self-addition.

test_cases.name: testDeprecated
test_cases.description: Tests the handling of deprecated options, ensuring the correct string representations are returned.

test_cases.name: testDuplicateLong
test_cases.description: Tests the addition of options with duplicate long names, ensuring the last added option description is retained.

test_cases.name: testDuplicateSimple
test_cases.description: Tests the addition of options with duplicate simple names, ensuring the last added option description is retained.

test_cases.name: testGetMatchingOpts
test_cases.description: Tests the retrieval of matching options based on a prefix, ensuring the correct options are returned.

test_cases.name: testGetOptionsGroups
test_cases.description: Tests the retrieval of option groups from an Options object, ensuring the correct groups are returned.

test_cases.name: testHelpOptions
test_cases.description: Tests the retrieval of help options from an Options object, ensuring the correct options are returned.

test_cases.name: testLong
test_cases.description: Tests the addition of long options to an Options object, ensuring the options are correctly added and retrievable.

test_cases.name: testMissingOptionException
test_cases.description: Tests the handling of missing required options, expecting a MissingOptionException.

test_cases.name: testMissingOptionsException
test_cases.description: Tests the handling of multiple missing required options, expecting a MissingOptionException.

test_cases.name: testSimple
test_cases.description: Tests the addition of simple options to an Options object, ensuring the options are correctly added and retrievable.

test_cases.name: testToString
test_cases.description: Tests the string representation of an Options object, ensuring the correct options are included.
